summary: A brother and sister battle a witch who lures teenagers into her suburban home with her special blend of marijuana where she then proceeds to kill and eat them to maintain her youth and beauty.
cast: Molly C. Quinn|Michael Welch|Lara Flynn Boyle|Cary Elwes|Andrew James Allen|Reynaldo Gallegos|Bianca Saad|Lochlyn Munro|Yancy Butler|Eddy Martin|Joe Ordaz|Celestino Cornielle|David Tillman|Claudia Choi|Edward Zo|Doug Haley|Xavier Kai Roy|Xander Kekoa Roy|Danielle Adams|Lexie Hofer|Karissa Thoma|Orvis Slack
title: Hansel & Gretel: La bruja del bosque negro
